imageMap - Variable in class gui.ImageStorage
Store the images for easy future access.
images - Variable in class gui.ButtonPalette
Stores the images to place on the buttons (as well as other images).
images - Variable in class gui.LogicBoardGUI
Stores the images needed to display the gates.
images - Variable in class gui.TiledCanvas
Basically a look-up table for the images of the tiles that can be placed on the board.
ImageStorage - Class in gui
This class maintains a mapping, which allows to get the proper visualization of each gate based on its type.
ImageStorage(LogicBoardGUI) - Constructor for class gui.ImageStorage
Load the images from their files and set up the mapping.
ind - Variable in class utility.GateWithIndexTuple
The GateIndex in this tuple.
index - Variable in class command.TryToRemoveConnection
If the removal was successful, store the index of the input that was removed.
indexOfLastSelectedTile - Variable in class gui.ButtonPalette
The buttons are stored in an array, and the this value stores the index of the last gate / tile / button that was clicked.
inEvaluatedState - Variable in class boardModel.LogicBoard
Keep track of whether the board has been evaluated => set it to true
InfoWindow - Class in gui
A generic scrollable window which only displays a text.
InfoWindow(String, int, int, String) - Constructor for class gui.InfoWindow
Constructor for a window with a given name, width, height containing a given text.
initEditMenu() - Method in class gui.LogicBoardMenu
Create the menu that allows resetting the board evaluating circuits on the board undoing commands redoing commands
initFileMenu() - Method in class gui.LogicBoardMenu
Create the menu that allows loading models from files and saving models to files.
initHelpAndAboutMenu() - Method in class gui.LogicBoardMenu
Create the menu that gives access to the "Help" and "About" window.
initPalette() - Method in class gui.ButtonPalette
Provide all buttons for gate / tile selection in a scroll pane on the right-hand side of the main frame.
InputGate - Class in gates
Inherit from this class for gates which have one or more input gates.

inputIndex - Variable in class command.ConnectGates
Specify which of the inputs was connected to.
inputs - Variable in class gates.InputGate
Stores the gates representing input (boolean) values.
isSelectedTileToPlace(TileType) - Method in class app.Controller
 
isValidEnd(Vector2Int, Vector2Int) - Method in class app.Controller
This function checks if a given position on the board is a valid end for a connection, i.e. the input or output of a Gate.
isValidStart(Vector2Int) - Method in class app.Controller
This function checks if a given position on the board is a valid start for a connection, i.e. the input or output of a Gate.
